```{r}
adrd <- read.csv("Accidental_Drug_Related_Deaths_2012-2021.csv")
```

```{r}
library(lubridate)
dates <- mdy(adrd$Date)
year <- year(dates)
month <- month(dates)

adrd$year <- year
adrd$month <- month
head(adrd)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(adrd, aes(x=year)) + geom_histogram() + labs(title = "Drug Overdoses in CT", x = "Year", y = "Drug Overdoses")
```
